resume.raw_text:
ASHISH GARG
Madhya Pradesh, India
ashishgargofficial6548@gmail.com | +91 97523 37964 | linkedin.com/in/ashish-garg-2b896432a
EDUCATION
B.Tech in Computer Science and Design Expected 2028
Madhav Institute of Technology and Science, Gwalior CGPA: 8.00/10.0
EXPERIENCE
Graphic Designer March 2025 – September 2025
Blue Planet Info Solutions, Mumbai, Maharashtra
• Designed 40+ recruitment posters and visual creatives for multiple companies, effectively communicating
job roles and employer branding across digital platforms
• Collaboratedwithinternalteamstodeliveron-brandcreativeswithintightdeadlines, supportingmultiple
concurrent hiring drives
• Managed company social media accounts with consistent posting schedule, improving reach and engage-
ment by 25–30% during active recruitment periods
Freelance Designer June 2022 – Present
Self-Employed
• Delivered 20+ freelance design projects including posters, social media creatives, and branding assets
with 100% on-time delivery
• Collaborated directly with clients to translate ideas into high-quality visual designs, achieving 90%+
client satisfaction rate
• Managedprojectsend-to-endfromconcepttofinaldeliverywhilebalancingmultipleclientssimultaneously
Fundraising Intern May 2021 – June 2021
Muskurahat Foundation
• Engaged20+potentialdonorsthroughdirectcommunication,helpingraise2,000forfoundationinitiatives
• Achieved 100% of assigned fundraising targets within stipulated timeframe
• Strengthened donor engagement processes, contributing to improved response rates
PROJECTS
UniCred – College Engagement Platform April 2025 – June 2025
unicred.vercel.app
• Designed user-centered interfaces for 10+ core features including event participation, leaderboards, and
certificate uploads
• Developed 20+ high-fidelity prototype screens, increasing student engagement by 30% during testing
• Conducted iterative user testing with 15+ students to refine layouts and accessibility
GreenScore AI – Sustainability Metrics Platform October 2025 – December 2025
greenscore-six.vercel.app
• Crafted engaging dashboards to display tree-count and sustainability metrics for 100+ simulated users
• Designed interactive visualizations reducing user comprehension time of satellite analysis by 40%
• Iterated on layouts and visual hierarchy based on feedback from 10+ test users
SKILLS
Design: UI/UX Design, Graphic Design, Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, Prototyping, Visual Design
Development: Web Development, App Development, HTML/CSS
Other: Marketing, Social Media Management, Client Communication, Project Management
PORTFOLIO
Behance: behance.net/ashishgargofficial | Figma: figma.com/@itsishhh2346
